acf.title: Head of Capital Development, Americas
acf.bio_copy:
Karyn Geringer is Head of Capital Development, Americas. She is responsible for building and developing new and current institutional investor relationships across the Americas region.

Prior to joining Millennium, Karyn was a founding partner at East Lodge Capital, where she was a member of the Management Committee and led the firm’s marketing and investor relations efforts globally. Before this, Karyn led the Americas marketing and investor relations team at CQS and prior to this at GLG Partners. Earlier in her career, Karyn worked at Pequot Capital, Credit Suisse and DLJ. She began her career as an Intelligence Officer in the United States Navy.

Karyn holds a BS in Political Science from the United States Naval Academy. She received her MBA from Columbia Business School.
